TopicTitle: I cannot open vab, sph, or tracking station, and I have done so many things! (CKAN)

Articles.Content:
For the past DAY I have been checking my installs. Earlier I Downloaded "Kerbalsim" And it had an error message, with the error message I couldn't open any buildings  . I then just uninstaled kerbalism via ckan and I tried opening ksp. I had everything OK But... Nothing but the Astronaut Center opened. The only thing that HAS Worked is unistalling all my mods, which I dislkike.

Edited December 28, 2022 by BronzeShoe20968
Misinfo

Well, the first thing I'll do is point you to the support thread, which contains information on what to do in order to get support.

The next thing I'll do is to ask you for a list of the mods, as well as the log file from when you open the game and are unable to enter any buildings.  A screenshot of the error you mentioned from Kerbalism would also be nice in us helping track down what the problem is.

I fixed the problem by unistalling all the mods and the whole game inculding the common folder. I figure that this has to with not kerbalism but texture replacer, as I had have this problem occur 3 times only because I had installed texture replacer with kerbalism first, and now texture replacer it self is casuing it. I then could reinstall mods I like, excluding texture replacer.

Edited December 31, 2022 by BronzeShoe20968
